mapper.select: SELECT EV_NUM , PROGRESS_CD , GETCODENAME(GATE_CD,'M122',PROGRESS_CD,#{ses.langCd}) as PROGRESS_NM , EV_NM , EV_CTRL_USER_ID , GETUSERNAME(GATE_CD,EV_CTRL_USER_ID,#{ses.langCd}) as EV_CTRL_NM , PURCHASE_TYPE , EV_TYPE , SCRE_EV_TPL_NUM , SITE_EV_TPL_NUM , (SELECT EV_TPL_SUBJECT FROM STOCEVTM TMP WHERE TMP.EV_TPL_NUM = SCRE_EV_TPL_NUM ) AS EV_TPL_SUBJECT , VENDOR_CD , GETVENDORNAME(GATE_CD,VENDOR_CD,#{ses.langCd}) as VENDOR_NM , (START_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') AS START_DATE , (END_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') AS END_DATE , RESULT_ENTER_CD , GETUSERNAME(GATE_CD,REG_USER_ID,#{ses.langCd}) as REG_USER_NM , (REG_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') AS REG_DATE , REQUEST_DATE AS REQUEST_DATE , COMPLETE_DATE AS COMPLETE_DATE , EG_NUM , ATT_FILE_NUM , APP_DOC_NUM , APP_DOC_CNT FROM STOCEVVM WHERE GATE_CD = #{ses.gateCd} AND DEL_FLAG = '0' AND EV_NUM = #{EV_NUM}

SELECT EVTM.EV_TPL_NUM , EVTM.EV_TPL_SUBJECT FROM STOCEVTM EVTM WHERE EVTM.GATE_CD = #{ses.gateCd} AND EVTM.DEL_FLAG = '0' AND EVTM.USE_FLAG = '1' AND EVTM.CREATE_TYPE_CD = 'S' AND EVTM.EV_TPL_TYPE_CD = 'S' ORDER BY EVTM.EV_TPL_NUM DESC

SELECT (SELECT GETSGCLASS(#{ses.gateCd} ,#{ses.langCd},1,SG_NUM)) AS CLS1 ,(SELECT GETSGCLASS(#{ses.gateCd} ,#{ses.langCd},2,SG_NUM)) AS CLS2 ,(SELECT GETSGCLASS(#{ses.gateCd} ,#{ses.langCd},3,SG_NUM)) AS CLS3 ,(SELECT GETSGCLASS(#{ses.gateCd} ,#{ses.langCd},4,SG_NUM)) AS CLS4 ,EV_NUM ,SG_NUM FROM STOCEVSC WHERE GATE_CD = #{ses.gateCd} AND DEL_FLAG = '0' AND EV_NUM = #{EV_NUM} GROUP BY GATE_CD, EV_NUM, SG_NUM ORDER BY GATE_CD, EV_NUM, SG_NUM

SELECT EVVU.EV_USER_ID , EVVU.USER_NM ,getUserDivisionName(#{ses.gateCd}, EVVU.EV_USER_ID, #{ses.langCd}) AS DIVISION_NM ,getUserDeptName(#{ses.gateCd}, EVVU.EV_USER_ID, #{ses.langCd}) AS DEPT_NM ,getUserPartName(#{ses.gateCd}, EVVU.EV_USER_ID, #{ses.langCd}) AS PART_NM , EVVU.POSITION_NM , EVVU.REP_FLAG , EV_NUM FROM ( SELECT EV_USER_ID ,GETUSERINFO(#{ses.gateCd},EV_USER_ID,'USER_NM') AS USER_NM ,GETUSERINFO(#{ses.gateCd},EV_USER_ID,'POSITION_NM') AS POSITION_NM ,REP_FLAG ,EV_NUM FROM STOCEVVU WHERE GATE_CD = #{ses.gateCd} AND DEL_FLAG = '0' AND EV_NUM = #{EV_NUM} ) EVVU ORDER BY EVVU.USER_NM

SELECT EVVM.GATE_CD , EVVM.EV_NUM , EVVM.PROGRESS_CD , EVVM.EV_CTRL_USER_ID , EVVM.REQUEST_DATE , (EVUR.EV_ID_SCORE, 0) AS EV_ID_SCORE FROM STOCEVVM EVVM LEFT JOIN ( SELECT EVUR.GATE_CD , EVUR.EV_NUM , SUM((EVUR.EV_ID_SCORE, 0)) AS EV_ID_SCORE FROM STOCEVUR EVUR WHERE EVUR.GATE_CD = #{ses.gateCd} AND EVUR.DEL_FLAG = '0' GROUP BY EVUR.GATE_CD, EVUR.EV_NUM) EVUR ON (EVUR.GATE_CD = EVVM.GATE_CD AND EVUR.EV_NUM = EVVM.EV_NUM) WHERE EVVM.GATE_CD = #{ses.gateCd} AND EVVM.EV_NUM = #{EV_NUM}

SELECT EVVM.VENDOR_CD , GETVENDORNAME(EVVM.GATE_CD, EVVM.VENDOR_CD, #{ses.langCd}) AS VENDOR_NM , EVVM.PURCHASE_TYPE , USR.TEL_NUM AS TEL_NUM , GETUSERNAME(EVVM.GATE_CD, EVVM.EV_CTRL_USER_ID, #{ses.gateCd}) AS USER_NM FROM STOCEVVM EVVM LEFT OUTER JOIN STOCUSER USR ON(EVVM.GATE_CD = USR.GATE_CD AND EVVM.EV_CTRL_USER_ID = USR.USER_ID AND USR.DEL_FLAG = '0') WHERE EVVM.GATE_CD = #{ses.gateCd} AND EVVM.EV_NUM = #{EV_NUM}
AND EVVM.DEL_FLAG = '0'

SELECT EVVU.EV_USER_ID AS RECV_USER_ID , GETUSERNAME(EVVU.GATE_CD, EVVU.EV_USER_ID, #{ses.langCd}) AS RECV_NM , USR.EMAIL AS RECV_EMAIL , USR.TEL_NUM AS TEL_NUM FROM STOCEVVU EVVU INNER JOIN STOCUSER USR ON EVVU.GATE_CD = USR.GATE_CD AND EVVU.EV_USER_ID = USR.USER_ID WHERE EVVU.GATE_CD = #{ses.gateCd} AND EVVU.EV_NUM = #{EV_NUM}
AND EVVU.DEL_FLAG = '0' AND EVVU.DEL_FLAG = '0' AND USR.DEL_FLAG ='0'
